name: Suffering (MilkShake Games)
description:
This game is for guys who like to suffer. There are only 6 levels in total but trust me, it will take you longer than one hour to BEAT! My first game from scratch without game engine.

How To?

Bird is automatically moving right to move left press Left arrow. 

Jump is on timer on the left.

Don't worry there is relaxing music in the background.
